dict.string:
# Save file, use tmp-file if there's no filepath. [[ -z "$TM_FILEPATH" ]] && TM_TMPFILE=$(mktemp -t rubymate) : "${TM_FILEPATH:=$TM_TMPFILE}"; cat >"$TM_FILEPATH"
[[ ${TM_WARN_LEVEL:-0} > 0 ]] && w='-w' || w='' ${TM_RUBY:-ruby} $w -- "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/tmruby.rb" ${TM_TMPFILE:+-t} "$TM_FILEPATH"
rm -f "$TM_TMPFILE"
